entry.title: Golang for Python Devs
entry.summary:
Description

Dana Garifullina https://kiwi.pycon.org/schedule/presentation/123/ Python is a popular language and we all know why, however itâ€™s hard to ignore the hype around new programming languages like Scala, Rust and Go. Billed as competition to Python, Go was the most intriguing one for me. In this talk I share experiences, compare two languages and answer the questions: why try Go? How easy or frustrating is it? And will you end up preferring it over Python?
